climatePledgeFriendly.details: The Forest Stewardship Council certified products support responsible forestry, helping keep forests healthy for future generations.

features: 25-count of ultra-soft, pre-moistened Neutrogena Makeup Remover Wipes with a micellar-infused triple emollient formula remove waterproof makeup and cleanses skin while leaving it feeling refreshed, soft, smooth and conditioned + a travel vanity case

Makeup remover face cleansing towelettes work to dissolve all traces of dirt, remove bacteria, impurities, oil and makeup on skin while also removing pollution, sweat and sunscreen, for superior cleansing and makeup removing power at your fingertips

Facial cleansing wet wipes are ophthalmologist-, dermatologist-, and allergy-tested and gentle around the eye area. The effective formula removes up to 99% of makeup--even stubborn waterproof mascara--without tugging
Makeup remover wipes are disposable and thoroughly cleanse skin, leaving behind no heavy residue so there's no need to rinse
Facial cleansing wipes are great to use in a daily beauty or skincare routine for a refreshing self-care experience at-home
body.description: Product Description Remove makeup in one easy step with Neutrogena Makeup Remover Face Wipes. These soft and gentle pre-moistened facial cleansing towelettes effectively dissolve all traces of dirt, oil and makeup--even waterproof mascara-- for clean, fresh looking skin every day. Our makeup remover features an effective micellar-infused, triple emollient formula that leaves skin feeling refreshed, nourished, conditioned and thoroughly clean with no heavy residue. These facial towelettes also remove sweat, sunscreen, and pollution from skin with no need to rinse after use. These daily face wipes are formulated to be gentle on the sensitive eye area and are suitable for contact lens wearers. The makeup removing wet wipes are formulated without phthalates, parabens, sulfates, alcohols, soaps, or dyes and are ophthalmologist-, dermatologist-, and hypoallergenic. Designed with the earth in mind, the home-compostable wipes are made with 100% plant-based cloth and biodegrade in 35 days in home compost. Brand Story By Neutrogena

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Love the way this takes everything off and leaves my face feeling clean.and not dry. Good for mature skin like mine. Scent is nice too. Really appreciate the container they came in as well to keep the wipes from drying out.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I’ve used these for years and they work wonderfully.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love these make up remover wipes. My go to after a long day and shaping my eyebrows
